title: Global Day of Coderetreat 2014 - Auckland, New Zealand - EllerslieDNUG
description:
Global Day of Coderetreat (http://globalday.coderetreat.org/) is a world-wide event celebrating passion and software craftsmanship. Last year, over 5000 passionate software developers in 170 cities around the world registered to spend the day practicing the craft of software development using the coderetreat format.  
   What is a coderetreat? 
   Coderetreat is a day­long, intensive practice event focusing on the fundamentals of software development and design. The coderetreat format has proven itself to be a highly effective means of skill improvement by providing developers the opportunity to take part in focused practice away from the pressures of 'getting things done.'  
   What can you learn? 
   • Pair programming with strangers 
   • Experiment with new programming languages 
   • Write code as you wish without usual real-world constraints... 
   • ... and then write code with some very unusual constraints  
   • Practice 4 rules of simple design  
   • Meet other passionate programmers that you can learn from 
    What do you need? 
   A laptop with the programming environment of your choice (IDE, unit test library, etc.) 
   How can you help? 
   Agenda: 
   8:30 - 9:00 Welcome coffee 
   10:00-10:30 Introduction 
   10:30-11:15 Session #1 
   11:15-11:30 Retrospective  
   11:30-12:15 Session #2  
   12:15-12:30 Retrospective  
   12:30-13:15 Session #3  
   13:15-13:30 Retrospective 
   13:30-14:30 Lunch break 
   14:30-15:15 Session #4  
   15:15-15:30 Retrospective 
   15:30-16:15 Session #5  
   16:15-16:30 Retrospective 
   16:30-17:15 Session #6  
   17:15-17:45 Retrospective of the whole day 
   
 
   17:45 - ??? Other sessions and discussions over a beer :) 
    
 
More info and registration: 
http://www.meetup.com/EllerslieDNUG/events/207317712/
